text: I am not my hurry.
author: AFW

text: My worth is older than my work.
author: AFW

text: I belong in rooms I have not yet entered.
author: AFW

text: I carry a name no failure can erase.
author: AFW

text: My edges are invitations, not errors.
author: AFW

text: I am allowed to be a slow miracle.
author: AFW

text: Self-kindness is my native language.
author: AFW

text: I keep company with my becoming.
author: AFW

text: I am the steward, not the storm.
author: AFW

text: I fit inside my life when I breathe.
author: AFW

text: I am allowed to take up gentle space.
author: AFW

text: My no makes room for my yes.
author: AFW

text: I can be unfinished and still be art.
author: AFW

text: I am allowed to change my mind without shame.
author: AFW

text: My body is a home, not a report card.
author: AFW

text: I inherit courage from every healed moment.
author: AFW

text: I can carry tenderness without apology.
author: AFW

text: I am worth the time it takes.
author: AFW

text: I practice being exactly this alive.
author: AFW

text: I am not behind; I am in process.
author: AFW
